nodes.text: Korriban: Planet of the Lost Souls is a role-playing supplement that was written by Cory J. Herndon and published online by Wizards of the Coast on October 2, 2003. Part of the Planet Hoppers series, it was published in five chapters, and tells the story of the doomed voyage of the pirate vessel Jynni's Virtue to the Sith tomb world of Korriban.
